# groupUserInterfaceLayoutDirection

**Instance Property**

The user interface direction that controls the layout order of the items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var groupUserInterfaceLayoutDirection: NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection/leftToRight].

If you want the order of the items in the group to respect the user’s preferred layout, set this property to the value of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/userInterfaceLayoutDirection] on the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication].

## Configuring groups

- **groupTouchBar**: A bar that holds this group’s items.
